content:
Hello,
I am hoping to use Harvard Dataverse to host data and generate a croissant metadata file. However, the Harvard Dataverse GUI limits uploads to 2.5GB/file and many of my files exceed this. Does anyone know if it is possible to upload larger files (20-30GB) to a dataset within the Harvard Dataverse and what the most straightforward process would be?
@Holly Chen hi! It's definitely possible. Please email support@dataverse.harvard.edu (from https://support.dataverse.harvard.edu/support )
